document.full_text: a neighbor was arrested on tuesday for raping and strangling a 9-year-old girl whose bloody body was found in a dumpster at their apartment complex in a philadelphia suburb.
document.title: neighbor charged in strangling of girl in pennsylvania
lines_and_colors: a neighbor was arrested on tuesday for raping and strangling a 9-year-old girl whose bloody body was found in a dumpster at their apartment complex in a philadelphia suburb.
